title: Gauge symmetry and cosmological constant on a brane
abstract: We have examined the localization of gauge bosons on the three-brane embedded in 5D bulk space-time,and we find two kinds of branes as the candidate for our world where both graviton and gauge bosons can be trapped. In one brane, the cosmological constant $\lambda$ should be zero in order to find gauge bosons on this brane. On another brane, a positive cosmological constant is needed to trap the gauge bosons in the bulk,even if how small $\lambda$ is.Which brane is realized depends on the configurations of the bulk.
